attributes.action: Stop mothers from keeping children away from fathers
attributes.additional_details: Loving caring fathers are committing suicide down to this. Children are going without because the mother says so. Familys are being torn apart and children are going without.
attributes.background: Id like men to have the same rights as women when it comes to parenting. The pain women are causing men on a daily basis is horrendous and barbaric. Its not right that this is still happening its ruining men and familys. Children growing up with no father down you relationship breakdowns.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
